Summary: bright balls of light in back yard changing sizes
divs: Sighting DetailsMy sister, father, and step mother just shared an experience that happened to them at their home in Lithonia, GA...event occurred for 1 hour from 2am to 3 am. Sister recorded 45min of video and photos... stated that she toyed with the object outside until it got to close for comfort. glowing ball of light floated around changed size...sister said she felt ball was scanning or probing her. These items have been seen and photographed by one of their neighbors...my parents wont talk much about the incident which occurred around January 13th or 14th 2011.
